name: Diagram: Electro Treasure Compass
desc: A detailed step-by-step diagram for making an Electro Treasure Compass. Use it to easily locate treasure all over Inazuma.

customize.name: Diagram: Electro Treasure Compass
customize.desc: A detailed step-by-step diagram for making an Electro Treasure Compass. Use it to easily locate treasure all over Inazuma.

customize.name: Electro Treasure Compass
customize.desc:
A handy tool used to locate nearby chests in Inazuma.
The land of the thundering archipelago has suffered a great many past hurts. The many treasure chests that dot the islands is a symbol of its revival from these wounds.

customize.name: Mora
customize.desc: Common currency. The one language everybody speaks.

customize.name: Golden Raven Insignia
customize.desc: A raven insignia that symbolizes the pride and the guiding principle of the Treasure Hoarders. Whether it's hidden amidst the vastness of the land or in the depths of the seas, as long as there are treasures to be hunted down, the spirit of Treasure Hoarders, who will stop at nothing to acquire them, will never die.

customize.name: Onikabuto
customize.desc: A strange beetle that inhabits areas rich with Electro energy. Its docile and sedentary temperament could not be more different from the fierce, demonic visage displayed on its armored shell.

customize.name: Crystal Chunk
customize.desc: An uncut crystal. Only professional craftsmanship can bring out its true value.

customize.name: Diagram: Anemo Treasure Compass
customize.desc: A detailed step-by-step diagram for making an Anemo Treasure Compass. Use it to easily locate treasure all over Mondstadt.

customize.name: Diagram: Geo Treasure Compass
customize.desc: A detailed step-by-step diagram for making a Geo Treasure Compass. Use it to easily locate treasure all over Liyue.

customize.name: Diagram: Dendro Treasure Compass
customize.desc: A detailed step-by-step diagram for making a Dendro Treasure Compass. Use it to easily locate treasure all over Sumeru.

customize.name: Diagram: Hydro Treasure Compass
customize.desc: A detailed step-by-step diagram for making a Hydro Treasure Compass. Use it to easily locate treasure all over Fontaine.
